summary: CIA memorandum to the FBI regarding Adolph Jay Albrecht, Charlotte Aberg, and Karl-Erik Ridderstrale. Albrecht reported to the American Embassy in Stockholm that Aberg told him Ridderstrale predicted President Kennedy's assassination. The CIA's files contain no recorded traces on Albrecht, Aberg, or Ridderstrale.
title: JFK, ASSISTANCE, SUSPECT, RIDDERSTRALE, KARL-ERIK, ALBRECHT, ADOLPH JAY, ABERG, CHARLOTTE, NAME CHECK
